pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
I've merged the other pull requests the enable the "fake install", and I've enabled `make codecheck` for examples in  ef48cbb (branch `codecheck_test`). I added a copyright notice to AlmostEmpty.cc to silence a cppcheck warning, but `make codecheck` currently fails for the examples that don't have any actual source files (most of them). So we could manually enumerate which examples have source code, or we could modify `make codecheck` so that it doesn't fail if no source files are found.

What do you think @nkoenig ?
content.html:
I've merged the other pull requests the enable the "fake install", and I've enabled make codecheck for examples in ef48cbb (branch codecheck_test). I added a copyright notice to AlmostEmpty.cc to silence a cppcheck warning, but make codecheck currently fails for the examples that don't have any actual source files (most of them). So we could manually enumerate which examples have source code, or we could modify make codecheck so that it doesn't fail if no source files are found.
